title: Nubank increases crypto offer one day after Itaú debut
description:
Nubank partnered with Circle to offer a stablecoin pegged to the U.S. dollar, USD Coin. Starting in the first quarter of next year, the neobank will also allow its customers to transfer cryptocurrencies from their Nubank account to other digital wallets and vice versa. In an interview with newspaper Valor Econômico, Thomaz Fortes, the executive […]

The post Nubank increases crypto offer one day after Itaú debut appeared first on The Brazilian Report.

title: Microsoft dips toes into Brazil’s voluntary carbon market
description:
Tech giant Microsoft announced it has purchased 1.5 million carbon credits from a Brazilian startup, funding a project to reforest degraded parts of the Amazon rainforest. The company did not disclose how much it paid in the transaction, but it is the company’s biggest foray so far into carbon credits anywhere in the world, forming […]

The post Microsoft dips toes into Brazil’s voluntary carbon market appeared first on The Brazilian Report.

title: Brazilian feds tackle arms trafficking ring operating in three countries
description:
Federal Police in Brazil and law enforcement officials in Paraguay and the U.S. launched on Tuesday an operation against a criminal ring suspected of selling weapons to Brazil’s major drug gangs.  According to a press statement by Brazil’s feds, a company based in Asunción, Paraguay, was responsible for importing thousands of pistols, rifles, and ammunition […]

The post Brazilian feds tackle arms trafficking ring operating in three countries appeared first on The Brazilian Report.
